幰字的基本解释

幰
xiǎn
车上的帷幔：“常乘高幰车。”
指车：“则绣幰已驻于庭。”

幰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiǎn］
［《廣韻》虚偃切，上阮，曉。］
(1)车帷。
(2)指幰车。

幰字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【巾字部】　幰； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页338第13
【唐韻】虛偃切【集韻】【韻會】許偃切，?音?。【說文】車幔也。【玉篇】車幰也。【倉頡篇】帛張車上爲幰。【廣雅】幨謂之幰。【釋名】幰，憲也，禦熱也。

幰字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
幰字的起名意思

暂无。

幰
Basic explanation of words
幰
xiǎn
The curtain on the car: "I often take the high car."
Pointing to the car: "The embroiderer is already in the courtyard."
幰
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiǎn］
["Guang Yun" Xu Yan cut, Shang Ruan, Xiao. ]
(1) Car curtain.
(2) Refers to the car.
幰
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Scarf Character Department] 　幰; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 338 13
[Tang Yun] Xu Yan cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Xu Yan cut, "Yin". [Said the text] The mantle is also. [Jade articles] Cars also. 【Cangjie Articles】The picture is on the car. [Guangya] What is called the one. [Release name] What, Xian Ye, Yure Ye.
